title: Foundations of AI Agents
description: Master the core building blocks of AI agents through progressive, hands-on tutorials

lessons.title: Simple LLM Call
lessons.description: Make your first API call using Anthropic Claude, OpenAI GPT, and LiteLLM

lessons.title: Prompt Engineering
lessons.description: Learn prompt engineering techniques including system messages, few-shot examples, and structured output

lessons.title: Interactive Chat
lessons.description: Build an interactive chat loop with message history using Anthropic Claude and OpenAI GPT

lessons.title: Tool Use
lessons.description: Enable LLMs to call functions and interact with external systems

lessons.title: Agent Loop
lessons.description: Build autonomous agents that use tools iteratively to accomplish complex goals

lessons.title: Codebase Navigator
lessons.description: An augmented LLM agent that explores codebases using retrieval, tools, and memory

title: Effective Agents Patterns
description: Architectural patterns that separate toy demos from real agents — learn when to chain, route, parallelize, or delegate

lessons.title: Prompt Chaining
lessons.description: Decompose tasks into sequential LLM calls where each step builds on the previous

lessons.title: Routing
lessons.description: Classify incoming requests and dispatch them to specialized handlers

lessons.title: Parallelization
lessons.description: Fan-out work across multiple LLM calls simultaneously, then aggregate results

lessons.title: Orchestrator-Workers
lessons.description: A central LLM dynamically decomposes tasks and delegates to parallel workers

lessons.title: Evaluator-Optimizer
lessons.description: One LLM generates, another critiques, and the cycle repeats until quality thresholds are met

lessons.title: Human in the Loop
lessons.description: Pause agentic workflows at strategic checkpoints for human review, approval, or editing

lessons.title: Content Writer
lessons.description: Production content writer agent combining all workflow patterns with Pydantic models and async event streaming

title: Advanced Techniques
description: Practical engineering problems you'll hit the moment agents leave the prototype stage — solved one tutorial at a time

lessons.title: Structured Output
lessons.description: Force LLM responses into exact schemas — JSON mode, Pydantic models, constrained generation

lessons.title: Context Management
lessons.description: Handle the reality of finite context windows with sliding windows, summarization, and chunking

lessons.title: Memory
lessons.description: Give agents memory that persists across sessions — short-term buffers, long-term stores, and vector databases

lessons.title: Prompt Caching
lessons.description: Cache static prompt prefixes to cut latency and cost

lessons.title: Multimodal
lessons.description: Process images, audio, and files alongside text

lessons.title: MCP (Model Context Protocol)
lessons.description: Connect agents to external tools through a standardized protocol

lessons.title: Multi-Agent Systems
lessons.description: Multiple agents collaborating on shared tasks with communication and delegation

lessons.title: RAG Techniques
lessons.description: Advanced retrieval patterns — vector search, hybrid retrieval, GraphRAG, and agentic RAG

title: Agent Frameworks
description: One agent, nine implementations — build the same system with each framework and compare trade-offs with your own hands

lessons.title: No Framework
lessons.description: The raw SDK baseline — pure client code with no abstractions

lessons.title: LangGraph
lessons.description: Graph-based agent orchestration from LangChain

lessons.title: Pydantic AI
lessons.description: Type-safe agent framework built on Pydantic

lessons.title: Google ADK
lessons.description: Google's Agent Development Kit with multi-agent orchestration

lessons.title: AWS Strands
lessons.description: AWS's agent SDK with native service integration

lessons.title: CrewAI
lessons.description: Role-based multi-agent collaboration framework

lessons.title: AutoGen
lessons.description: Microsoft's multi-agent conversation framework

lessons.title: LlamaIndex
lessons.description: Data-centric agent framework with strong RAG primitives

lessons.title: Semantic Kernel
lessons.description: Microsoft's AI orchestration SDK with plugin architecture

title: Testing & Evaluation
description: Agents are non-deterministic — testing them requires different thinking. Measure quality, catch regressions, and build confidence before shipping

lessons.title: Unit Testing Agents
lessons.description: Mock LLM responses and test agent behavior deterministically

lessons.title: Evals
lessons.description: Build evaluation suites that measure accuracy, quality, and regression over time

lessons.title: Tracing & Debugging
lessons.description: Trace every LLM call, tool invocation, and decision point

lessons.title: Red Teaming & Safety
lessons.description: Adversarial testing for agents — prompt injection, jailbreaks, and guardrails

title: Production
description: The gap between 'works on my laptop' and 'runs reliably at scale' — principles, deployment, monitoring, cost control, and security

lessons.title: 12-Factor Agents
lessons.description: Principles for building production-grade agents

lessons.title: Deployment Strategies
lessons.description: Containers, serverless, and scaling patterns for agents

lessons.title: Monitoring & Observability
lessons.description: Metrics, structured logging, and distributed tracing for production agents

lessons.title: Cost Optimization
lessons.description: Token budgets, caching strategies, and model routing for cost control

lessons.title: Security & Guardrails
lessons.description: Authentication, sandboxing, and prompt injection defense
